name: (ISAAC) Programming - File Handling
description: In this online session you will learn programming techniques used with file handling, the session is aimed at GCSE students. The event shows how in Python to work with files in different modes.

name: ITT & ECT webinar series: AI and computing teaching
description: Revolutionise your teaching experience with the latest support from the National Centre for Computing Education (NCCE). If you're an ECT (or mentor) or an ITT (or tutor) in England, this is the perfect opportunity for you.

name: (ISAAC) Programming - Errors, Testing, Tracing
description: In this online session on Errors, Testing, and Tracking, youâ€™ll explore key GCSE programming concepts related to identifying, testing, and resolving errors in code.

name: Discover Computing Ambassadors
description: Join us at Kainos' Birmingham office to hear about the National Centre for Computing Education's (NCCE) Computing Ambassador scheme and the impact you could be having on young people.

name: I Belong Enrichment workshop: movement-controlled light (KS3) - Girls only
description: Join us for an inspiring journey where technology meets art. The workshop is aimed at young female students in Year 7 and Year 8; give them the opportunity to spark their creativity and illuminate the path to a bright future at our female-led computing workshop in support of the I Belong programme!.
